text: jis din tum sab ko us jama hone ke din jama karega wahi din hai haar jeeth ka aur jo shaqs Allah par imaan la kar nek amal kare, Allah us se us ki buraiyya door kar dega aur ose jannato mein dakhil karega jin ke niche nehre beh rahi hai, jin mein wo hamesha hamesha rahenge, yahi bahuth badi kamyaabi hai
